DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the effectiveness of Transversus Abdominis Plane (TAP) block as a part of a multimodal postoperative pain management after laparoscopic surgery on colon.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Transversus Abdominis Plane (TAP) Block After Laparoscopic Colon Surgery
DOC.criteria: Age 18 80 BMI 18 40 ASA 1 3 Written consent Can cooperate Mb Chron and Collitis Ulcerosa Drug and alcohol abuse Pregnancy Consumption of opioids Drug allergy
